text:
After saving, the javascript console shows the following error (translated from
German):

Error: No element found
Source file:
http://localhost:8080/lenyatrunk/default/authoring/index.xml?lenya.module=webdav&lenya.event=edit&exit=true
Zeile: 1, Spalte: 1
Source text:
^

Saving works nevertheless.
creator: andreas@apache.org
